title: Brigitte Foissac
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021132449/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021132449/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Brigitte Foissac**

[Belgian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021132449/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Belgium) font designer who released the calligraphic font face Mockingbird in 2000.  
See: [http://www.garagefonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021132449/http:/www.garagefonts.com/ "http://www.garagefonts.com")  
 [http://members.chello.be/mevrard/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021132449/http:/members.chello.be/mevrard/ "http://members.chello.be/mevrard/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021132449im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mocki02_3848.jpg)
author: bfoissac
